itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break in our first ever Drinkin' Bros Sports companion show with results of UFC 226, the starters for the MLB All Star game, the dominance of Joey Chestnut, and why the Golden State Warriors might not ever lose again.
